sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: Zend_Service_Gravatar provides a client for the Gravatar Web Service. With this component you can provide to your users ability to use avatar images which are globally recognized.

sect2.title: Check for Gravatar
sect2.para: Zend_Service_Gravatar::isValid() is used to determine if the avatar provided by the Gravatar Web Service is valid. It has no arguments.
The isValid() method will return either true or false, and throw an exception if the response is not successful.

example.title: isValid() Usage
example.programlisting: isValid()) { //Avatar is valid. Let's print it. echo '' . "\n"; }

sect2.title: Zend-specific Accessor Methods
sect2.para: Zend_Service_Gravatar has several additional accessors that may be used for modifying internal properties.

listitem.para: getGravatarId() allow you to retrieve generated Gravatar ID.
getEmail() and setEmail() allow you to retrieve and modify the e-mail address used to make the request.
getParams() and setParams() allow you to retrieve and modify params used to make the request.
